content.text:
Hello! My name is Daniel Graf and this is the mobile version of my personal website! I am a Software Engineer, Full Stack Developer, aspiring Product Manager, Musician, and Film Enthusiast. Having graduated from Carnegie Mellon's Information Systems program, I understand the synergy that exists between people, processes, and technology.

This website is best enjoyed on a desktop because it was made using React with the intention of mimicking my PDF resume layout. However, if you would like to see a summary of my projects and experience, you can do that here!

Education:
Carnegie Mellon University
B.S. Information Systems
w/ University Honors
Minor in German
May 2017
3.6 GPA

Skills:
Leadership | Microsoft Office 
Project Management | UI/UX 
Mobile Dev | Public Speaking 
Frontend & Backend Dev 

Programming:
Ruby on Rails | Ruby | SQL 
Git | HTML | CSS | JavaScript 
Swift | C | Python | NodeJS 
Java | ReactJS | AngularJS 

Languages:
English | German
